1.0.0.name: wordpress/ultimate-auction
1.0.0.description:
The Ultimate Wordpress Auction plugin allows easy and quick way to set up a professional auction website in ebay style.

Simple and flexible, Ultimate Wordpress Auction plugin works with any WordPress theme. Lots of features, very configurable. Easy to setup. Great support.

Features:

Core Features

1. Ajax Admin panel for better management.
2. Add standard auctions for bidding
3. Buy Now option with paypal
4. Upload multiple product images
5. Show auctions in your timezone        
6. Paypal ready payment settings
7. Set Reserve price for your product
8. Set Bid incremental value for auctions
9. Ability to edit, delete & end live auctions
10. Re-activate Expired auctions
11. Email notifications to bidders for placing bids
12. Email notification to Admin for all activity
13. Email Sent for Payment Alerts
and Much more...

Display Features

1. Auction feed Page which shows excertps of live
